scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection includes a typescript of Arthur Davison Ficke's poem "Portrait of That Renowned Gentleman Vachel Lindsay as at the First Poetry Dinner He Confronted the Celtic Lion & Bit Him in the Leg." In a letter, n.d., Ficke writes to Lindsay concerning the tribute he is writing about Lindsay.
